title: Monetary Policy: By Rule, By Committee, or By Both?
content: For release on delivery  12:30 p.m. EST   March 3, 2017      Monetary Policy:  By Rule, By Committee, or By Both?         Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     2017 U.S. Monetary Policy Forum, sponsored by  the Initiative on Global Markets at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business     New York, New York    March 3, 2017
